ranked_diseases.explanation: This condition matches all presented phenotypic features (intellectual disability, short stature, microcephaly) and is supported by similar reference cases.
This syndrome presents with developmental delays and short stature, and while not all features match precisely, it has notable overlaps.
This syndrome is characterized by short stature and developmental delays, with microcephaly being a less common feature.
While this syndrome includes intellectual disability and can present with short stature, microcephaly is less typical.
